definition: To undergo a transformation or change in state, often used to express the process of becoming or developing into something different. It is commonly employed to indicate the future tense or to form the passive voice.

examples.german: Ich werde morgen ins Kino gehen.
examples.english: I will go to the cinema tomorrow.
